Title: What Is Srinivasa Ramanujan's Magic Square?
Article:
This Square looks like any other normal magic square. But this is formed by great mathematician of our country – Srinivasa Ramanujan



Sum of numbers in any column is 139



Sum of numbers in any row is 139



Sum of numbers in any diagonals is 139



Sum of numbers in corners is 139 too



Sum of numbers in center is 139 too



Sum of numbers in identical colored boxes is 139 too



Sum of numbers in these identical colored boxes is 139 too



Try these combinations too



And these combinations too



Now lets face the climax
Do you know date of birth of Srinivasa Ramanujan?
Its 22nd December 1887
